synthesis_conditions.additional_information: CTH-14 could also be obtained in a similar reaction without the 4,4′-azopyridine.

characterization_methods.details: Performed on a Mettler Toledo TGA/DSC3+ in an air atmosphere with a heating rate of 10 °C/min between 30 °C and 800 °C.
Performed by Mikroanalytisches Labor Kolbe c/o Fraunhofer Institut UMSICHT Gebäude G – Osterfelder Str. 3 D-46047 Oberhausen, Germany and by Chalmers Materials Analysis Laboratory.
Acquired using the SAXSLAB Mat:Nordic instrument equipped with a micro-focus Cu X-ray (λ = 1.54 Å) or a Bruker D8 Twin diffractometer (Billerica, Massachusetts, USA) with Cu-Kα radiation λ = 1.54.
